Metadata.title: MR FUNGUS | Premium Grown Lion's Mane Mushrooms Malaysia
Metadata.description: MR FUNGUS (Remora Resources PLT) specializes in premium grown Lion's Mane Mushrooms and cultivation kits. 100% chemical-free, fresh from farm to table.
Metadata.keywords: Grown Lion's Mane Mushroom, Mushroom Farm Malaysia, Fresh Mushrooms, Growing Kit, Remora Resources, MR FUNGUS, Organic Mushrooms

AboutUs.title: Welcome to MR FUNGUS
AboutUs.intro: Malaysia's leading specialist in Lion's Mane Mushroom.
AboutUs.description1: We focus on one mushroom and honed our craft to perfection. Grown indoors using Japanese cultivation techniques under tightly controlled conditions, every batch delivers consistent freshness, texture, and flavour.
AboutUs.description2: Loved by chefs and home cooks alike, our Lion’s Mane is also trusted by certified health supplement brands as a key ingredient. Due to our dedication, enjoying this premium mushroom no longer comes at a premium price.

ProductIntro.title: Product Introduction
ProductIntro.subtitle: Everything You Need to Grow
ProductIntro.description: Our Lion's Mane Grow Kit makes it easy to cultivate fresh, gourmet mushrooms right at home. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced grower, our kit provides everything you need for a successful harvest. Experience the joy of growing your own food!
ProductIntro.item1: Fully colonized Lion's Mane substrate block
ProductIntro.item2: Humidity tent for perfect growing conditions
ProductIntro.interested_desc: We are currently accepting orders via inquiry. Contact us to get your kit!

Insights.title: How we differ from other farms
Insights.step1_desc: Unlike most farms that import ready-to-fruit mushroom bags, we built our entire research & production line in-house. This gives us the expertise and control to avoid production bottlenecks, delivering a stable year-round supply.
Insights.step2_desc: After years of refinement, we have dialed in our in-house method and the top-performing strain. The result is fresh Lion’s Mane with exceptional texture, flavour, as well as consistency, always trusted by chefs for its unmistakable taste.
Insights.step3_desc: At MR FUNGUS, quality and safety go hand in hand. We are proudly 100% organic, from start to finish.Our used substrates never go to waste too — they’re collected by our partner and transformed into compost to keep nourishing other crops.

OurStory.title: OUR STORY
OurStory.background_p1: Eight years ago, our founder’s grandmother was diagnosed with Alzheimer’s. In search of natural ways to support brain health, he discovered Lion’s Mane, a mushroom which gains recognition for its neuro-supportive properties. What began as a personal mission soon evolved into a passionate commitment to grow fresh Lion’s Mane with care and consistency.
OurStory.background_p2: However, cultivating Lion’s Mane was not easy. It took years of trials and refinement to achieve reliable consistency. After his grandmother’s passing, the mission grew stronger: to deliver fresher, higher-quality Lion’s Mane to the local market.
OurStory.background_p3: He discovered that most Lion’s Mane in the market came as dried imports. Yet their key bioactives, hericenones and erinacines, are extremely sensitive to drying and high heat. In other words, heavy processing would reduce the mushroom's potency.
OurStory.lab_p1: Founded in 2019, MR FUNGUS (Remora Resources PLT) began as a dedicated R&D initiative to cultivate truly premium Lion’s Mane. After five years of relentless testing and refinement, we developed a stable and efficient growing system, making large-scale local production of high-quality Lion’s Mane a reality.
OurStory.lab_p2: Starting from growing mycelium in petri dishes and transferring it onto 99% sterilized wood substrates, our method closely mimics the mushroom’s natural wild environment. By utilising European oak as the primary substrate, combined with advanced Japanese indoor-farming technology, we have achieved a truly organic, pesticide and contamination-free cultivation process.

Mission.title: Our Mission
Mission.content: To establish Malaysia’s benchmark for Lion’s Mane mushrooms: fresh, certified organic, farm-to-table, and consistently available at an affordable price through disciplined in-house cultivation.

Footer.description: Specializing in locally grown premium Lion's Mane mushrooms.
